item.title: Chateau du Bousquet
item.description: This was one of the first Bordeauxs I’ve every tried. It wasn’t great, but a decent introducion to this style. I wouldn’t seek this one out again. Tasting Notes Dark ruby with hints of brown arond the edges Primary aroma of dark red fruitâ€”cranberry, and jam Some vegital aromoas of tomato and earth Clove and vanilla Medium-minus body High acidity Medium-minus tannin Medium finish
